name: RAL Colorpicker
tagline: WordPress Plugin for inserting a select form element for choosing RAL Classic colors
body:
### About
This WordPress plugin is based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_RAL_colors

### Installation
#### From your WordPress dashboard

* Visit 'Plugins > Add New'
* Search for and download 'ral-colorpicker'
* Activate RAL Colorpicker from your Plugins page.

#### From other sources
* Download RAL Colorpicker.
* Upload the 'ral-colorpicker' directory to your '/wp-content/plugins/' directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc...)
* Activate RAL Colorpicker from your Plugins page.

### Contribution
Make a pull request!

### Support or Contact
Create an issue here at Github or at WordPress.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
